title: Publisher Rocket: Unleash the Category Feature Reveal

tactics.name: unleash the category
tactics.description: Feature to analyze competitor book categories and identify optimal niches
caveats: Amazon category changes may affect reliability
source_quotes: you can see all the categories that all those books were part of

heuristics.name: category validation
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200 then boost category relevance
source_quotes: a lot of authors are surprised to see what Amazon is putting them in

claims.statement: Amazon frequently changes book categories affecting data reliability
source_quotes: Amazon has been fixing with their categories they've been changing things around on us

niche_patterns.description: Identify underserved niches with specific constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines identity (target audience) with problem (need) and constraint (religious alignment)
source_quotes: you might see a recipe category pop up that's because there are some authors who are choosing shall we say categories that they shouldn't
